Method Detail

enqueueMessage

public void enqueueMessage(java.lang.String message)
Adds a message to the messageQueue and calls the processQueue().

Parameters:
message -

processQueue

private void processQueue()
Starts a new thread for processing the Queue (run()), if no Thread exist. Otherwise it do nothing.

run

public void run()
Process the messageQueue and set text of the Statusbar.
Each message is displayed 2 seconds.
If the Queue is empty the thread is yield and the thread variable is set to null, so that processQueue() generates a new Thread if necessary.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

setMessage

private void setMessage(java.lang.String message)
Set the text of the StatusBar.

Parameters:
message -
